alert.note: Alert for Itawamba; Lee; Monroe (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 3:59PM CDT until July 21 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN ITAWAMBA...LEE AND NORTHWESTERN MONROE COUNTIES... At 359 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Pontotoc, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Tupelo, Amory, Fulton, Verona, Tombigbee State Park, Saltillo, Shannon, Plantersville, Mantachie, Evergreen, Nettleton, Abney, Mooreville, Eggville, Ballardsville, Flowerdale, Old Union, Beech Springs, Skyline and Belden. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
